items.sentence: Tom wasn\'t able to do everything he promised he\'d do.
Did you expect something different to happen this time?
You think I could stop Tom from doing that, don\'t you?
Tom doesn\'t have what it takes to make it around here.
When was the last time that you went swimming with Tom?
When we were kids, Tom and I could talk about anything.
I don\'t think that anybody suspected you weren\'t Tom.
I don\'t know how long it\'ll take me to get to Boston.
Let\'s start with what we were talking about yesterday.
Don\'t you usually use a pick when you play the guitar?
